name: Darkness Simorgh
desc: If you Tribute Summon a DARK or WIND monster: You can Special Summon this card from your GY (if it was there when you Summoned), or hand (even if not). This card's Attribute is also treated as WIND while it is in the Monster Zone. When a Spell/Trap card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 WIND Winged Beast monster; negate that activation, and if you do, destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Darkness Simorgh" once per turn.
